verses.verse: "You shall therefore love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and always <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> His charge, <S%H4931><s%> His statutes, <S%H2708><s%> His ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and His commandments. <S%H4687><s%>

"And know <S%H3045><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> that I [am] not [speaking] with your sons <S%H1121><s%> who <S%H834><s%> have not known <S%H3045><s%> and who <S%H834><s%> have not seen <S%H7200><s%> the discipline <S%H4148><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> – His greatness, <S%H1433><s%> His mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and His outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%>

and His signs <S%H226><s%> and His works <S%H4639><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He did <S%H6213><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> his land; <S%H776><s%>

and what <S%H834><s%> He did <S%H6213><s%> to Egypt's army, <S%H2428><s%> to its horses <S%H5483><s%> and its chariots, <S%H7393><s%> when <S%H834><s%> He made the water <S%H4325><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> to engulf <S%H6687><s%> them while they were pursuing <S%H7291><s%> you, and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> completely <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H2088><s%> destroyed them;
and what <S%H834><s%> He did <S%H6213><s%> to you in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> you came <S%H935><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%>

and what <S%H834><s%> He did <S%H6213><s%> to Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab, <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> when the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6475><s%> its mouth <S%H6310><s%> and swallowed <S%H1104><s%> them, their households, <S%H1004><s%> their tents, <S%H168><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H3351><s%> thing <S%H3351><s%> that followed <S%H7272><s%> them, among <S%H7130><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> –
but your own eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He did. <S%H6213><s%>

"You shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> commandment <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am commanding <S%H6680><s%> you today, <S%H3117><s%> so <S%H4616><s%> that you may be strong <S%H2388><s%> and go <S%H935><s%> in and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into which <S%H834><s%> you are about to cross <S%H5674><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it;

so that you may prolong <S%H748><s%> [your] days <S%H3117><s%> on the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers to give <S%H1><s%> to them and to their descendants, <S%H5414><s%> a land <S%H2233><s%> flowing <S%H776><s%> with milk <S%H2100><s%> and honey. <S%H2461><s%>

"For the land, <S%H776><s%> into which <S%H834><s%> you are entering <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, is not like the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> from which <S%H834><s%> you came, <S%H3318><s%> where <S%H834><s%> you used to sow <S%H2232><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> and water <S%H8248><s%> it with your foot <S%H7272><s%> like a vegetable <S%H3419><s%> garden. <S%H1588><s%>

"But the land <S%H776><s%> into which <S%H834><s%> you are about to cross <S%H5674><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, a land <S%H776><s%> of hills <S%H2022><s%> and valleys, <S%H1237><s%> drinks <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from the rain <S%H4306><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%>

a land <S%H776><s%> for which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> cares; <S%H1875><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> are always <S%H8548><s%> on it, from the beginning <S%H7225><s%> even to the end <S%H319><s%> of the year. <S%H8141><s%>

"And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about, if <S%H518><s%> you listen <S%H8085><s%> obediently <S%H8085><s%> to my commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am commanding <S%H6680><s%> you today, <S%H3117><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> and to serve <S%H5647><s%> Him with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> your soul, <S%H5315><s%>

that He will give <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> for your land <S%H776><s%> in its season, <S%H6256><s%> the early <S%H3138><s%> and late <S%H4456><s%> rain, <S%H3138><s%> <S%H4456><s%> that you may gather <S%H622><s%> in your grain <S%H1715><s%> and your new <S%H8492><s%> wine <S%H8492><s%> and your oil. <S%H3323><s%>
"And He will give <S%H5414><s%> grass <S%H6212><s%> in your fields <S%H7704><s%> for your cattle, <S%H929><s%> and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> and be satisfied. <S%H7646><s%>

"Beware, <S%H8104><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> your hearts <S%H3824><s%> be deceived <S%H6601><s%> and you turn <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> them.

"Or the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you, and He will shut <S%H6113><s%> up the heavens <S%H8064><s%> so that there will be no <S%H3808><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> and the ground <S%H127><s%> will not yield <S%H5414><s%> its fruit; <S%H2981><s%> and you will perish quickly <S%H6><s%> from the good <S%H4120><s%> land <S%H2896><s%> which <S%H776><s%> the Lord <S%H834><s%> is giving <S%H3068><s%> you.

"You shall therefore impress <S%H7760><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> of mine on your heart <S%H3824><s%> and on your soul; <S%H5315><s%> and you shall bind <S%H7194><s%> them as a sign <S%H226><s%> on your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and they shall be as frontals <S%H2903><s%> on your forehead. <S%H996><s%> <S%H5869><s%>

"And you shall teach <S%H3925><s%> them to your sons, <S%H1121><s%> talking <S%H1696><s%> of them when you sit <S%H3427><s%> in your house <S%H1004><s%> and when you walk <S%H1980><s%> along the road <S%H1870><s%> and when you lie <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> and when you rise <S%H6965><s%> up.
"And you shall write <S%H3789><s%> them on the doorposts <S%H4201><s%> of your house <S%H1004><s%> and on your gates, <S%H8179><s%>

so <S%H4616><s%> that your days <S%H3117><s%> and the days <S%H3117><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%> may be multiplied <S%H7235><s%> on the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers to give <S%H1><s%> them, as long <S%H5414><s%> as the heavens <S%H3117><s%> [remain] above <S%H8064><s%> the earth. <S%H5921><s%>

"For if <S%H518><s%> you are careful <S%H8104><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> commandment <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am commanding <S%H6680><s%> you, to do <S%H6213><s%> it, to love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> His ways <S%H1870><s%> and hold <S%H1692><s%> fast <S%H1692><s%> to Him;

then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will drive <S%H3423><s%> out all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and you will dispossess <S%H3423><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> you.

"Every <S%H3605><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> the sole <S%H3709><s%> of your foot <S%H7272><s%> shall tread <S%H1869><s%> shall be yours; your border <S%H1366><s%> shall be from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> to Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> [and] from the river, <S%H5104><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates, <S%H6578><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the western <S%H314><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%>

"There shall no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> be able to stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall lay <S%H5414><s%> the dread <S%H6343><s%> of you and the fear <S%H4172><s%> of you on all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> you set <S%H1869><s%> foot, <S%H1869><s%> as He has spoken <S%H1696><s%> to you.
"See, <S%H7200><s%> I am setting <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you today <S%H3117><s%> a blessing <S%H1293><s%> and a curse: <S%H7045><s%>

the blessing, <S%H1293><s%> if <S%H834><s%> you listen <S%H8085><s%> to the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am commanding <S%H6680><s%> you today; <S%H3117><s%>

and the curse, <S%H7045><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you do not listen <S%H8085><s%> to the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> but turn <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am commanding <S%H6680><s%> you today, <S%H3117><s%> by following <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have not known. <S%H3045><s%>

"And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about, when <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brings <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are entering <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, that you shall place <S%H5414><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim <S%H1630><s%> and the curse <S%H7045><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal. <S%H9403><s%>

"Are they not across <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> west <S%H310><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%> toward the sunset, <S%H8121><s%> <S%H3996><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> who live <S%H3427><s%> in the Arabah, <S%H6160><s%> opposite <S%H4136><s%> Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the oaks <S%H436><s%> of Moreh <S%H4176><s%>?

"For you are about to cross <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> in to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is giving <S%H5414><s%> you, and you shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it and live <S%H3427><s%> in it,

and you shall be careful <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am setting <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you today. <S%H3117><s%>
